value.name: Cesar Garcia, Santa Maria baseball
value.description: Garcia, a freshman, hit a two-run home run in a 12-0 win over Mission Prep on May 12. He then followed that up with a grand slam as he finished with five RBIs in a 9-6 win over the Royals on Saturday.
